column8: https://sg.news.yahoo.com/guan-eng-ppbm-can...-071011634.htmlGuan Eng: PPBM cannot be allowed to monopolise Pakatan leadershipNew Straits Times	HANA NAZ HARUNNew Straits TimesJune 14, 2017PETALING JAYA: Parti Pribumi Bersatu Malaysia (PPBM) cannot be allowed to ‘monopolise’ the Pakatan Harapan leadership, says DAP secretary-general Lim Guan Eng.He said this in a response to a purported PPBM Pakatan Harapan leadership lineup list, which had named former prime minister Tun Dr Mahathir Mohamad and Tan Sri Muhyiddin Yassin as the opposition coalition's chairman and president, respectively.“I did not attend the last meeting, I have yet to receive that report. But what I know is that Pakatan Harapan has yet to make the final decision.“Personally, I do not agree that both positions are held by PPBM.“There should be consultation with other parties,” he told a press conference here, today.However, when asked his views on whether Dr Mahathir should play the leading role in Pakatan Harapan, Lim said the PPBM chairman should be allowed to "play a major role"."After all, he is a former prime minister. He should be allowed to play one of the major roles alongside (PKR president) Datuk Seri Dr Wan Azizah Wan Ismail, (DAP adviser) Lim Kit Siang, (Parti Amanah Negara president) Mohamad Sabu and (PPBM president) Muhyiddin."
Malays pun tak semestinya sokong mamak and muhyiddinLagipun if 1 party rule all macam bn then apa bezanya vote bn atau ph? Lastly semua pun sama main style taiko jer.

“I did not attend the last meeting, I have yet to receive that report. But what I know is that Pakatan Harapan has yet to make the final decision.the guy never went to the meeting.. and he is commenting on it...Confirm Set set Hadi ni...Owai
What he said is true though. None of the parties from Pakatan is supposed to hold the top two posts of its coalition. To rub salt to the wound, both were ex BN members lol.
